name: BotyPy - Slack Bot in Python
description: **BotyPy** is a Python BOT, based on the slack_bolt, interfacing with the Slack platform in Socket Mode using the Events API.

SLACK_APP_TOKEN.description: App-level tokens represent your app across organizations, including installations by all individual users on all workspaces in a given organization. (begins with xapp*)

SLACK_BOT_TOKEN.description: Bot tokens represent a bot associated with the app installed in a workspace. Unlike user tokens, they're not tied to a user's identity; they're just tied to your app.(begins with xoxb*)

LOGGING_LEVEL.description: Python standard levels and their applicability are described below (in increasing order of severity)

GOOGLE_SEARCH_API_KEY.description: Custom Search JSON API requires the use of an API key. An API key is a way to identify your client to Google.

GOOGLE_CSE_ID.description: Google Programmable Search Engine ID, provided by Google that allows web developers to feature specialized information in web searches
